entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
